attributes.action: Parliament to form a Government of National Unity to resolve Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
•	This Government of National Unity will rule until Parliament is satisfied that Brexit issues have been fully resolved in the national interest. 
•	All matters relating to Brexit will be determined by 'free votes' in both Houses. 
•	The Government of National Unity will note that the 2016 referendum was advisory and may not reflect the current will of the people.
•	Finally, the Government of National Unity will enable a General Election as soon as the Brexit issues have been resolved.
attributes.background:
Having shown itself unable to solve the problems of finding an acceptable Brexit deal, the government should immediately stand aside and enable Parliament to form a Government of National Unity. 
•	The Government of National Unity will immediately agree with the EU all necessary time extensions.
